data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Veneto, Italy today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Veneto, Italy
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Veneto, Italy, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Veneto access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 71,556 believers in Veneto to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 71,556 believers in Veneto.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Veneto. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.section_summary:
the state of Veneto, Italy has a population of 4,912,400.

We estimate Veneto has 71,556 people who might know Jesus, 3,923,878 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 916,966 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 4,912,400 people living in Veneto through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
